properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 1:26PM EST until February 9 at 4:56AM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North
Carolina...

Yadkin River At Yadkin College affecting Davidson and Davie Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
the Yadkin River At Yadkin College.
* At  1:01 PM Saturday the stage was 24.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
late this afternoon.
* Impact...At 25.0 feet, Flooding closes Sowers Road near Linwood and
Hollywood Drive at Grub Ferry road. A campground on Hannah Ferry
Road is flooded. Flooding also threatens the pumping station at
Davidson, Incorporated.
* Impact...At 23.0 feet, The upper campsites at the Thousand Trails
Preserve off US64 begin to flood.
* Impact...At 21.0 feet, Lower level primitive campsites at the
Thousand Trails Preserve off US64 begin to flood.
* Impact...At 18.0 feet, Minor flooding of mainly farmlands on both
banks.
* Impact...At 15.0 feet, The river is at bankfull.
properties.instruction:
Safety message. If you encounter deep water while driving, do not
attempt to drive through. Turn around, dont drown.
